data.title: Wipro & Icertis
data.meta_description: Wipro Limited is a professional services partner with Icertis and leading global information technology, consulting, and business process services company. Icertis and Wipro help companies adopt full contract lifecycle management (CLM) solutions for the enterprise. The partnership offers customers unique business expertise for contracts, leveraging deep industry knowledge and use cases. Learn more.
data.text:
Wipro Limited is a professional services partner and a leading global information technology, consulting, and business process services company. The company harnesses the power of cognitive computing, hyper-automation, robotics, cloud, analytics, and emerging technologies to help clients adapt to the digital world and make them successful. Wipro has recognized globally for its comprehensive portfolio of services, a strong commitment to sustainability, and good corporate citizenship.

Icertis and Wipro help companies adopt full contract lifecycle management solutions for the enterprise. The partnership offers customers unique business expertise for contracts, leveraging deep industry knowledge and use cases. Jointly, Icertis and Wipro provide a global delivery model for the Icertis Contract Intelligence (ICI) platform, allowing customers to realize value and success.

Wiproâ€˜s team of legal experts supports organizations in strategizing the migration of legacy contracts by capturing the key metadata, at a granular level, using homegrown AI/ML solutions. Additionally, Wipro offers a managed services model for ongoing contract review and compliance services resulting in contract visibility, reduction of risks, and potential cost savings.
